## Number of refugees per country

```{r,echo=F}
setwd(data.path)
load("Europe.RData")
Europe2 <- Europe@data[!is.na(Europe@data$Refugees_14),]
Tab2 <- Europe2[order(Europe2$Refugees_14,decreasing=T),c("name","Refugees_14"),]

kable(head(Tab2,n=20))
```
